00032 typedef enum {

00033     B_OFF    = 0,

00034     B_ON     = 1,

00035     B_AUTO   = 2

00036 } ON_OFF_AUTO;

00046     LAYER3 = 0x02

00063     BL_DIM      = 0,

00064     BL_BRIGHT   = 1

00076 typedef struct {

00077     INT8U           onOffAuto;

00078     INT8U           brightness;

00079     INT16U          autoTime_10mSec;

00080 } BACKLIGHT_INFO, *PBACKLIGHT_INFO;

00086 typedef struct {   // used for lighting up single LCD pixels

00087     INT16U  x;

00088     INT8U   y;

00089 } LCD_POINT, *PLCD_POINT;

00106 typedef struct {   // used for specifying display inking limits

00107     LCD_POINT   upperLeft;

00108     LCD_POINT   lowerRight;

00109 } LCD_RECT, *PLCD_RECT;

00110 

00126 typedef struct {    // signature display related variables

00127     INT8U       onOffAuto;            // ON_OFF_AUTO          B_AUTO

00128     INT8U       layer;                // LCD_LAYER            LAYER_1

00129     INT8U       color;                // PEN_COLOR            PEN_BLACK

00130     INT16U      autoTime_10mSec;        // x * 10 mSec          500 (5 seconds)

00131     INT8U       width;

00132     LCD_RECT        region;

00133 } INK_INFO, *PINK_INFO;

00134 

00149 typedef struct {

00150     INT8U       cursor;           // cursor visibility to be 00

00151     INT8U       layer1;           // layer 1 controls, 2 bits

00152     INT8U       layer2;           // layer 2 controls, 2 bits

00153     INT8U       layer3;           // layer 3 controls, 2 bits

00154 } VISIBILITY, *PVISIBILITY;

00155 

00159 typedef enum {          // visibility options for LCD layers

00160     CURSOR_OFF  = 0x00,

00161     LAYER_OFF   = 0x00,

00162     LAYER_ON    = 0x01,

00163     LAYER_FLASH = 0x02,

00164     LAYER_HALF  = 0x03

00165 } LAYER_CODE;

00166

00180     MIX_AND_OR  = 0x1E,

00237 typedef struct {

00238     INT8U           layer;

00239     INT8U           originX;

00240     INT8U           originY;

00242     INT8U           rawData[LCD_WIDTH*LCD_HEIGHT/8];

00286 typedef struct {     // System calibration settings

00287     DISPLAY_CAL     display;        // LCD X and Y gain & offset

00288     INT16U          pressureThreshold;  // min pressure to activate

00290     FILTER_CAL      filter;         // speed adaptive filter parameters
